name: metlsavr
story:
Metal Saver ï¿½ 1994 First Amusement.

Metal Saver is an arcade 2D platform game, similar to Snow Brothers, or Bubble Bobble. The player can choose from two characters - martial artist Hanbit, or girl with guns, Narae. Their task? the player must kill all the enemies on the level, and collect bonuses. Every few stages awaits a boss (like a huge spider). Game has co-op mode.
